name: Alchemy Engine
description:
Our Submission for the MV15 game jam.

- ---Controls--- -

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

R - Reload

P - Reload the level (if you hit a bug)

(Note: there are some bugs in the game I haven't got round to fixing yet, leave a comment if you find one, thank you!)

- ---Most Recent Update--- -

Minor Update (1.0.1) (15/3/22)

  • Collision bug fixes
  •  Fixed wall jumping bug
  •  Coyote Time increased
  •   Enemies now move the player when the player is on their head
